resources.string:
Hi, my name is Maja. 

I love programming, travelling and reading. 

I have recently completed a Java Programming Bootcamp and am now developing my skills through different online courses and private projects. My favourite programming languages are Java and Kotlin. 

I have visited several European countries, as well as the United States of America. I liked Vienna, Zurich, New York, Paris, Dublin and Amsterdam the most. My next destination is Novi Sad, Serbia and Southeast Asia (Vietnam). 

I have been a member of the library since I was 4, and I enjoy reading novels, popular psychology and sociology. My favourite books are the Harry Potter series.
